name: gusplease
text: "Probationary Ichthyologist" sounds like a score ranking in the original Toejam & Earl.

name: hannah
text: pat is a weiner. :)

name: i_love_kate
text:
The correct spelling is "Wiener"...

Although "ei" is an acceptable ethnic variant.

name: mangtastic
text: Pat is Viennese?

name: johnnyrocker
text: Mildly obscure Simpsons reference. Nice.

name: gouldgonewild
text: Oh my god. What a fantastic game.

name: gouldgonewild
text: That dentist...with his prancing and high-pitched laughing...

name: cracklewater
text:
Because Pat is such a FUCKING DICK, it's not 'Junior Ichthyologist' or 'Apprentice Ichthyologist' or 'Acolyte Ichthyologist' or 'Student Ichthyologist'.

It's 'probationary', implying the possibility of exclusion and failure from the get-go.

It takes a special talent to make me hate a fictional character this much.

name: thommy_h
text: IMAGINATION GAMES

name: epicurus
text: I remember people like this when I was a kid.

name: norsef
text:
And they usually worked in the cool places like the zoo or space museum.
As a child I remember thinking "How can you be so miserable when you own a tiger!?!".

name: backdraft
text:
Chubby for you. People in the computer lab are now looking at me strangely.

All I remember as a child was being bitten by a duck. :(

name: fineoakstructure
text: wait... are you Pat ?

name: backdraft
text:
Wait, did you just ask me if I was an asshole?
It wasn't a birthday party though, it was at the lake.
I'm sure most vegans must have some sort of traumatic reason for choosing such a lifestyle however.

name: soticoto
text: I refused to go to the zoo when I was a kid, as it occurred to me that being in a small enclosure for life and being stared and pointed at by infants of other species all making horrible screeching noises would be as close to hell as one is likely to find... and I really didn't want to be part of the problem.

name: semiquaver
text: I lived next to one.  I crawled into his lap once when I was three and he muttered "I hate children" as if I couldn't hear him.

name: spicyponyhead
text: Real child-haters wouldn't have let your sticky-fingered, crumb-encrusted, stubby-legged child-self anywhere NEAR their laps.

name: semiquaver
text:
he was obligated by his kindly mother

the kindly mother whose home he later stole after forcing her into a nursing home, a change which brought about her death

i'm not saying i hold a grudge i'm just laying the facts on the line

name: epicurus
text: Shit got very real very fast in this post.

name: greenkoolayd
text: first person that says it gets lamed.

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
my wife would agree that "no system of adequiately shielding the right-thinking population from the lunacy and inconvenience of children yet exists".

and here i'm assuming 'right-thinking' to mean 'correctly-thinking' in pat's vernacular (and not 'republican-thinking').

name: soticoto
text: I would agree with your wife then.

name: tatterdemalion
text:
Everyone agrees with his wife.

It is very hard not to.

name: patkun
text:
NO IMAGINATION GAMES
by order

name: killerlimpet
text: A comment left by killerlimpet was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, GMM, EndOfTheWorld)

name: farqussus
text: If I see your eye unfocus, and if I perceive the merest hint of internal dialogue, you shall be banned with immediacy and forevermore!

name: crinklebat
text: What really makes this for me is the INITIAL AND CONTINUE at the bottom.

name: deancain29
text: I love that Pat has this paperwork in a consertina, ready for use.

name: timjankowiak
text: Pat is such a douche.

name: gormster
text: Pat is such a dick he even uses a fax machine.

name: juanclaudius
text: I was just about to mention this. What kind of dick faxes you his many-sectioned papers re: visiting his aquarium? The most hardcore dick, that's what kind.

name: featurelessvoid
text: You don't even want to know how many forms you'll have to fill out if you want to bring a barber to see his aquarium.

name: soticoto
text:
He'll make you and the barber fill out the forms... and then deny the barber access ANYWAY.
That is how much of a dick he is.

text:
Pat may also have:
_ a falcon
_ polio
_ an Apple ][

text: Does he also have an Apple IIc, polio, or a falcon?

name: centipede_damascus
text: Now Teodor feels like it may not have been the best idea to tell Philippe that Pat has an aquarium.

name: norrin
text: Pat is such a jerk, he feels the need to have kids know he doesn't want them there.

name: cavenuke
text: Pat thinks pendants will delight children.

name: tripleg
text: i think he just wants to put something around their neck to make noise, in case they wander off whilst playing imagination games

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: Got on down to Nicaragua
Philippe: Aquarium visit. Sort of.

name: foetus_punch
text: Oh man, this comic arc ended with Pat crossing his arms and physically butting them out o his house. Pat: What A Douche.

name: mattylite
text: If you don't read the blogs, you miss out on classic lines like "It felt kind of bad to get touched by Pat, like a statue was mad at you and came to life, and it was scary."

name: i_love_kate
text: And yet we're still waiting on the Pat creation myth...

name: tripleg
text: it's oddly coincident with Ray's neutering, i imagine

name: i_love_kate
text:
IT

WAS

A

VASECTOMY.

name: achilleselbow
text: Once again, I find myself agreeing with Pat, this time regarding children.

name: confusion
text: As someone who went to David Starr Jordan Middle School in Palo Alto and loathed it, I am thrilled to see Onstad invoking that name in the context of Pat.

name: glandwich
text: Man, was Pat always such a dick? Am I right? I guess people can change but it sucks when they change outside the boundaries of acceptable behavior like an old school friend who wants to stab you every day, for example

name: mercuri0us
text: He was nice for a while, but then he changed back.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Philippe's thought bubbles convey perfectly the rollercoaster of emotion you feel as a child when listening to one side of a phone conversation regarding something you're extremely excited about, and hearing your chance of happiness trickle away.

Who am I kidding, this still happens to me now.

name: alzuna
text:
I read the beginning of your comment and I thought 'I STILL do that, I probably have problems.' and then I read the end of your comment.

I feel less lame now.

name: atticusonline
text: Noooo!

name: greenkoolayd
text: word.  chubbed.

name: chetyre
text: I wish I could chubby you twice, ma'am.  The thought bubble made this strip for me.

name: jhunter
text: man Pat is the kind of person that says "CHEER UP!" to random people on the street while being a complete Dick King himself

name: desert_donkey
text:
9b... sweet.

a Child is like a pest: just like them.

name: acefalco
text:
I don't like to admit this, but before I met my wife, I was basically Pat.

Sorry, everyone.

name: spicyponyhead
text: ...and now your child-bride has changed your mind?

name: splendorr
text:
Good that you have both the perspective and the willingness to acknowlege and apologize for it.

Everyone forgives you.

name: nyl
text: Why Pat gotta be like that?

text: Pat is a dick.
